name: phonebook-backend
description: Phonebook backend for Fullstack Open Part 3

scripts.build:ui: powershell -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Set-Location ../Fullstack-part2/phonebook; npm run build; Set-Location ../../Fullstack-part3; Copy-Item -Path ../Fullstack-part2/phonebook/dist -Destination ./dist -Recurse"
